text: Carol Raye (17 January 1923 â€“ 19 June 2022) was a British-born Australian actress, comedian, singer, dancer, and radio and television producer and director.Vale: Carol Raye Raye was best known as the producer and starring in The Mavis Bramston Show. She was also in the soap opera Number 96 as Baroness Amanda von Pappenburg. She also played herself in The Mike Walsh Show and was a regular panellist on the game show Blankety Blanks. Raye died on 19 June 2022 in Sydney, Australia at the age of 99. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Naturalised citizens of Australia Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:British dancers Category:British television producers Category:British television directors Category:British television personalities Category:Actors from London Category:Comedians from London Category:Singers from London Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Australian stage actors Category:Australian businesspeople Category:Australian singers Category:Australian comedians Category:Actors from Sydney
title: Carol Raye
